markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Armor 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lattice Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=27)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 9 gp

**AC Bonus** +4

**Dex Cap** +1

**Check Penalty** -2

**Speed Penalty** -5 ft.
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Strength** 16

**Bulk** 2

**Category** Medium

**Group** Chain
</row>

</column>

---

Fine metal cables woven into latticework patterns form this armor. This armor disperses blows much like rings of chain mail, but is much tighter in construction, making it quieter.

<title level="2">Armor Specialization Effects</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 275 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Certain class features can grant you additional benefits with certain armors. This is called an armor specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which armor group your armor belongs to, as listed below. Only medium and heavy armors have armor specialization effects.

[Click here for the full rules on Armor Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=211).

<document level="2" id="armor-group-1" />

<title level="2">Specific Magic Armor</title>
[Energizing Lattice](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1846)
name: Lattice Armor
